Advisory.Description:
Jenkins 2.393 and earlier, LTS 2.375.3 and earlier, and prior to LTS 2.387.1 is affected by the Apache Commons FileUpload libraryâ€™s vulnerability CVE-2023-24998. This library is used to process uploaded files via the Stapler web framework (usually through StaplerRequest#getFile) and MultipartFormDataParser in Jenkins.

This allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) by sending crafted requests to HTTP endpoints processing file uploads.

Jenkins 2.394, LTS 2.375.4, and LTS 2.387.1 limits the number of request parts to be processed to 1000. Specific endpoints receiving only simple form submissions have a lower limit.
Advisory.Summary: Denial of service in Jenkins Core
